original_text: What does this show us about God's Law which he gave to Moses? When we say that all people need to believe in Jesus, does that mean that God's Law has no purpose? No! When we believe in Jesus, we are showing the true purpose of God's Law. What does this show us about God's Law which he gave to Moses? When we say that all people need to believe in Jesus, does that mean that God's Law has no purpose? No! When we believe in Jesus, we are showing the true purpose of God's Law. korean_text: 그런즉 우리가 믿음으로 말미암아 율법을 파기하느냐 그럴 수 없느니라 도리어 율법을 굳게 세우느니라

sentences.korean_translation: 그가 모세에게 주신 법에 대해서 말입니까?

sentences.original_text: that all people need to believe in Jesus,
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 예수를 믿어야 한다고 말할 때,

sentences.original_text: that God's Law has no purpose?
sentences.korean_translation: 하님의 법이 목적이 없다는 것을 말입니까?
